data.title: Bush Tour Dates & Tickets
data.meta_description: Buy Bush tickets at Event Tickets Center. View all Bush tour dates with interactive seating maps. Huge selection of tickets backed by our 100% Buyer Guarantee.
data.text:
Buy Tickets to the Next Bush Concert

Tickets to Bush shows are available now right here at Event Tickets Center! Many of their shows have sold out elsewhere, but not here. Event Tickets Center has a limited number of tickets available for their next several shows. Prices start at $9, but can range all the way up to $50,095. So, you need to act fast before ticket prices rise. If you are on the fence about going to see Bush live, we have conveniently laid out some of the most important information about them. Listen to some of their most popular music via the playlist below and read up on some of their background and biggest achievements. Find the event you want to attend in the event list below, so you can purchase your tickets to go see Bush live!

Who is Bush?

Bush is a band that has reached mainstream status across the Rock, Alternative, and Grunge categories. Bush has released 19 live and studio albums and 16 singles on Spotify that string all the way back to Dec 6, 1994 with their debut album titled Sixteen Stone (Remastered). Their most recent album release was The Art Of Survival (Deluxe) on Jun 9, 2023.

Bush's Popularity

Bush's growth has led to an overall artist ranking of 5,313 on Spotify in the United States. They have become well known for their exciting shows and entertaining performances which has built a robust following. This is largely fueled by over 2,000,000 listeners and more than 1,000,000 followers on Spotify, but they also reach an additional tens of millions of listeners on Spotify through playlists. Additionally, Bush has a robust following on social media with more than 200,000 followers on Instagram. They average over 4,000,000 videos on YouTube and their top video on TikTok has tens of millions of views on the social media platform. There are also nearly 30,000 posts on Tik Tok with Bush's tracks featured on them. Bush is most listened to in Chicago in the United States.When you attend your next Bush show, it will be easy to see why they have built such a large following.

Bush as an Artist

You likely recognize Bush by their top tracks which include "Glycerine - Remastered", "Machinehead - Remastered", and "Comedown - Remastered". You might also listen to Bush due to their earliest albums such as Sixteen Stone (Remastered), Razorblade Suitcase (Remastered), and Razorblade Suitcase (In Addition), but you may have heard of them from similar artists such as Stone Temple Pilots, Jane's Addiction, and Temple Of The Dog.

Bush's RIAA Awards

Bush has reached the pinnacle of any artist's career by earning an RIAA award. Their top award came on Jul 1, 1997 for their album Razorblade Suitcase. They received a Multi-Platinum award for the album. In total, Bush has 2 Multi-Platinum albums. That's not all though. Bush has been fortunate enough to achieve a Platinum award for one more album. Even with all of this success, their RIAA collection finishes with one additional Gold album. As such a well renowned artist, you can be certain that Bush's shows are going to be unforgettable thanks to their decorated music library.

Bush's Music Library

Bush has released a total of 19 albums on Spotify and is the main or feature artist on 448 tracks. Their full discography can be found in the charts below, as well as their top 10 songs. However, when you attend a Bush show, you're sure to hear more than a few of their big hits from their top albums which include Sixteen Stone (Remastered), Razorblade Suitcase (Remastered), and Razorblade Suitcase (In Addition). Their most recent album, The Art Of Survival (Deluxe) was released on Jun 9, 2023. To supplement their albums, Bush has released 16 singles on Spotify. Their top singles, which will more than likely be included in their setlists, are Inflatable (Online Music), The Sound of Winter, and The Afterlife (Radio Edit), with their most recent single, Nowhere To Go But Everywhere, being released on Sep 20, 2023.

Bush Announces North American Tour: "Loaded: The Greatest Hits 1994-2023"

Rock band Bush has announced a North American headlining tour in support of their upcoming release, "Loaded: The Greatest Hits 1994-2023.‚Äù

The album is set to be released on November 10, 2023, and the tour will kick off shortly after in November.

The tour will feature the band's greatest hits from their 30-year career, including their chart-topping songs "Comedown," "Glycerine," and "Machinehead." Bush will be joined on tour by Bad Wolves and Eva Under Fire.

Fans can expect an electrifying performance from the band, who have sold over 20 million records worldwide and are known for their high-energy shows. The tour will be a celebration of the band's career and a chance for fans to relive some of their favorite Bush moments.

Loaded: The Greatest Hits 1994-2023 Album

Bush, the British rock band, is set to release their career-spanning greatest hits album titled "Loaded: The Greatest Hits 1994-2023" on November 10, 2023. The album will feature 17 of their biggest hits, including "Glycerine," "Comedown," "Machinehead," and "Swallowed," as well as two new tracks, "Nowhere to Go" and "Everywhere."

"Loaded" will be released in various formats, including CD, vinyl, and digital download. The vinyl version will be available in a limited edition blue vinyl, while the CD version will come with a bonus DVD featuring music videos and live performances.

The album will also include a booklet with rare photos and liner notes written by the band members themselves, providing insight into their career and the making of their biggest hits.

Bush's frontman, Gavin Rossdale, commented on the album, saying, "We're excited to release 'Loaded,' a collection of our greatest hits spanning our entire career. We're also thrilled to include two new tracks that we feel really capture the essence of Bush and where we're headed musically."

Fans can pre-order "Loaded" now and receive an instant download of the new single "Nowhere to Go." Bush will also embark on a North American headlining tour in November and December 2023 in support of the album, with support from Bad Wolves and Eva Under Fire.

North American Tour

Bush, the British rock band, has announced a North American tour in support of their new release, "Loaded: The Greatest Hits 1994-2023". The tour will kick off on November 14, 2023, in Orlando, Florida, and will end on December 8, 2023, in Indio, California.

Tour Dates

The tour consists of 18 dates, with the majority of them taking place along the East Coast and Northeastern region of the continent. The following is a list of the tour dates:

Locations

The tour will cover various cities throughout the United States and Canada, including Orlando, Atlanta, Baltimore, Philadelphia, New York, Boston, Montreal, Toronto, Chicago, Minneapolis, Denver, Salt Lake City, Seattle, Portland, San Francisco, and Spokane.

Fans of the band can expect to hear some of their greatest hits from the past 29 years, including "Comedown," "Glycerine," "Swallowed," "Machinehead," and "The Chemicals Between Us." The band will be joined by support acts Bad Wolves and Eva Under Fire.

Band Members

Bush, an English rock band formed in London in 1992, consists of four members: Gavin Rossdale (vocals, guitar), Robin Goodridge (drums), Chris Traynor (guitar), and Corey Britz (bass guitar).

Gavin Rossdale, the frontman of the band, is known for his distinctive vocals and guitar playing. He has been the face of the band since its inception and has been the primary songwriter of the band's hits.

Robin Goodridge, the drummer of the band, has been with Bush since its formation. He has been an integral part of the band's sound and has contributed to many of the band's most popular songs.

Chris Traynor, the guitarist of the band, joined Bush in 2002. He is known for his technical guitar skills and has been a valuable addition to the band's sound.

Corey Britz, the bassist of the band, joined Bush in 2010. He has been a key contributor to the band's live performances and has added a new dimension to the band's sound.

Together, these four talented musicians have created some of the most iconic rock songs of the past few decades. With their upcoming tour, Bush will be celebrating their greatest hits and showcasing their incredible talent to audiences across North America.

Historical Significance

Bush is a British rock band formed in 1992. The band's debut album, "Sixteen Stone," was released in 1994 and became a commercial success, reaching multi-platinum status in the United States. The album spawned several hit singles, including "Comedown," "Glycerine," and "Machinehead."

Throughout their career, Bush has released seven studio albums and sold over 20 million records worldwide. The band's music is known for its grunge and post-grunge influences, as well as its introspective lyrics and powerful guitar riffs.

Bush's upcoming release, "Loaded: The Greatest Hits 1994-2023," is a celebration of the band's career and legacy. The album features 17 tracks, including their biggest hits and fan favorites, as well as two new songs.

To support the release, Bush is embarking on a North American headlining tour in November 2023. The tour will feature support from BAD WOLVES and EVA UNDER FIRE and will include stops in major cities across the United States and Canada.

The tour is a testament to Bush's enduring popularity and influence in the rock music scene. It is also a chance for fans to relive the band's greatest hits and experience their powerful live performances.

Influence on Music Industry

Bush has been a significant influence on the music industry since their debut album, "Sixteen Stone," was released in 1994. The band's unique sound, which combines elements of grunge, alternative rock, and post-grunge, has inspired countless artists in the years since.

One of the ways in which Bush has influenced the music industry is through their use of guitar effects. Lead guitarist Nigel Pulsford is known for his innovative use of effects pedals, which has helped to shape the band's distinctive sound. Many guitarists have been inspired by Pulsford's use of effects, and have incorporated similar techniques into their own playing.

Another way in which Bush has influenced the music industry is through their lyrics. Lead singer Gavin Rossdale's introspective and often poetic lyrics have resonated with fans around the world. Many artists have been inspired by Rossdale's writing, and have sought to emulate his ability to craft lyrics that are both meaningful and accessible.

Finally, Bush's longevity and continued success have been an inspiration to countless musicians. The band's ability to evolve and adapt to changing musical trends has allowed them to remain relevant over the years. As a result, Bush has become a role model for other artists who aspire to have long and successful careers in the music industry.

Overall, Bush's influence on the music industry has been significant and enduring. The band's unique sound, innovative use of effects, introspective lyrics, and longevity have all helped to shape the musical landscape over the past two decades. As Bush embarks on their "Loaded: The Greatest Hits 1994-2023" North American Tour, it is clear that their influence will continue to be felt for many years to come.

Ticket Information

Fans of Bush can purchase tickets for the North American tour on Event Tickets Center.

It is recommended to purchase tickets as soon as possible as they are expected to sell out quickly.

For those who are unable to attend the North American tour, the band has also announced plans to tour internationally in 2024. Dates and ticket information for these shows will be announced at a later date.

Overall, Bush's "Loaded: The Greatest Hits 1994-2023" North American tour is expected to be a highly anticipated event for fans of the band. With a mix of classic hits and new material, it promises to be a memorable experience for all who attend.

Concert Expectations

As Bush prepares to embark on their North American tour in support of their upcoming release "Loaded: The Greatest Hits 1994-2023," fans are eagerly anticipating what the band has in store for their live performances.

With a career spanning nearly three decades, Bush has amassed a loyal following with their unique blend of grunge, alternative rock, and post-grunge sounds. Fans can expect to hear a mix of their greatest hits, including "Glycerine," "Comedown," and "Machinehead," as well as newer tracks from their latest release.

In addition to their signature sound, Bush is known for their high-energy live performances. Fans can expect an electrifying show complete with dynamic stage presence, impressive lighting and effects, and crowd-pleasing interactions.

For those attending the concert, it is recommended to arrive early to secure a good spot and to familiarize themselves with the venue's policies and procedures. Fans should also be prepared for a loud and lively atmosphere, and are encouraged to wear comfortable clothing and shoes.
